001package andesite.player;
002
003import andesite.NodeState;
004import andesite.player.filter.FilterChainConfiguration;
005import com.sedmelluq.discord.lavaplayer.player.AudioPlayer;
006import io.vertx.core.json.JsonObject;
007
008import javax.annotation.CheckReturnValue;
009import javax.annotation.Nonnull;
010
011public interface BasePlayer {
012    /**
013     * Returns the node that owns this player.
014     *
015     * @return The node that owns this player.
016     */
017    @Nonnull
018    @CheckReturnValue
019    NodeState node();
020    
021    /**
022     * Returns the user id of this player.
023     *
024     * @return The user id for this player.
025     */
026    @Nonnull
027    @CheckReturnValue
028    String userId();
029    
030    /**
031     * Returns the guild id of this player.
032     *
033     * @return The guild id for this player.
034     */
035    @Nonnull
036    @CheckReturnValue
037    String guildId();
038    
039    /**
040     * Returns the frame loss counter of this player, which tracks how
041     * many frames were sent or lost over the past minute.
042     *
043     * @return The frame loss counter of this player.
044     */
045    @Nonnull
046    @CheckReturnValue
047    FrameLossCounter frameLossCounter();
048    
049    /**
050     * Returns the filter configuration for this player.
051     *
052     * @return The filter configuration for this player.
053     */
054    @Nonnull
055    @CheckReturnValue
056    FilterChainConfiguration filterConfig();
057    
058    /**
059     * Returns the audio player for this player.
060     *
061     * @return The audio player for this player.
062     */
063    @Nonnull
064    @CheckReturnValue
065    AudioPlayer audioPlayer();
066    
067    /**
068     * Encodes the state of this player for sending to clients.
069     *
070     * @return A json object containing the state of this player.
071     */
072    @Nonnull
073    @CheckReturnValue
074    JsonObject encodeState();
075}
